# NSLayoutConstraint.Axis.vertical

**Case**

The constraint applied when laying out the vertical relationship between objects.

## Declaration

```swift
case vertical
```

## Constants

- **NSLayoutConstraint.Axis.horizontal**: The constraint applied when laying out the horizontal relationship between objects.
